website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re giving a baby a Pooh and Piglet puppet show, or watching a 4-year-old’s recreation of Tigger’s latest adventure, these make a sweet gift set.
pros: 4-pack of Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, Eeyore, and Piglet hand puppets

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for a small child puppeteer
customer_reviews.text: I am a respiratory therapist taking care of Covid 19 ventilator patients at the hospital so I cannot see my sweet granddaughters. They used to come play at my house ever Friday. Their mommy says they have been watching a lot of Winnie the Pooh movies at home so I decided to purchase these as a surprise from Mimi and place them on their porch (with gloves on of course!). I was very pleased with the quality and they come wrapped in a plastic cover so it was easy for me to disinfect it. Those are important things these days! Thank you, Amazon, for the speedy delivery! Mimi can still share a little love with her babies!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: The show was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: we used these puppets recently at an event we had for kids and there were quite entertaining. my daughter had a Winnie pooh story book collection. I chose one and I created our own play based on that story! I also used a tri fold presentation board to create a stage. It was very much fun for us and for the kids. The only reason I dropped a star is I wish there have been designed in a way that our hands could have gone through all the way to the head. that would have been much easier to maneuver the puppet.
customer_reviews.author: Marzieh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our new nephew along with some Winnie the Pooh board books. Was expecting the little finger ones, but these were a great size. He is only 3 months old, but they caught his attention. They are very well made and in several months he will be able to play with them himself. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: JACP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use when Skyping with my grandchild. They absolutely love it. The stuffing on the heads makes the the puppets more true to character's appearance in my opinion. Definitely is too tight for someone with larger hands but otherwise adult or child could fit. I thought the quality was fine.
customer_reviews.author: ch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality hand puppets
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter loves it when we use these puppets. They are very well made. The faces are friendly and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: RPS in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Talking Pooh
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them and all things Pooh. Fun to use when reading Pooh out loud.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and well made puppets! I keep 2 of them in each of our diaper bags for doctor appointments and 2 of them at home for general play/fussy diaper changes. My child is about 2 months so the bright colors are a great distraction for him but when he gets a bit older these will have a lot more fun uses! Also they match our whinnie the Pooh themed bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: The head is adorable, but the bottom is thin.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to make loveys to sell. The head of the puppets are beautifully colored, but overall the material is thin and cheap. I was afraid that the color would fade or come off, so I washed them before I put them up for sale. I was surprised that the color held. They aren’t a thick, plush material; they feel like velveteen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: ADOREABLE
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and was so very much surprised. These puppets are too stinking cute and so much bigger than I anticipated. My daughter is doing her baby's room in Winnie the Pooh, so of course mom mom has been going nuts buying Winnie the Pooh items. Now, mom mom does realize these won't get used for another year but I just couldn't resist.
customer_reviews.author: Erose

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: My sons absolute favorite toy he sleeps with them, plays make believe with them, and learned each of the characters names because of the puppet shows I put on for him. Definitely a great buy. The fabric is sturdy and not fraying, the puppets are definitely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These hand puppets are a little thin on the material. You stick your pinky and thumb on the two hands of the puppet. The head moves as a whole. That is the only area that really has any padding. And that padding clumps up sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: icyp3nguin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: They can earlier than expected. They are great hand puppets but I used them for a diaper cake. Tiger and piglet looked great as well just didn’t use them. However the mom to be snatched the whole set to take home.
customer_reviews.author: DaSean Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Hand puppets
customer_reviews.text: Bought the puppets for storytelling program, have to use them for online programs. The puppets are soft, but the way how they are made is not the best - very wide body and short hands does not permit to operate well. They are more toys than puppets.
customer_reviews.author: Alla Markova

customer_reviews.title: Cute, baby loved them
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old niece loved these puppets right away! They are simply made and the fabric isn't super thick, but they are cute and the kids love them. With a set of four, everyone in the family gets to play a character!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, soft and adorable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Using these (and a few other things) as center peices for my friend's Pooh themed baby shower. So cute and soft! Going to make great toys for the baby after. Good quality and size. I love Melissa and Doug toys. Always well made!
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: I bought several orders
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, I ordered several sets for nephews, nieces, and grandchildren. So much fun to find an easy way to play with children instead of just watching them play. These little hand puppets are well made and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: OMG, CUTENESS GRENADE!
customer_reviews.text: My friend's baby "theme" is Winnie the Pooh and the baby is due this Monday. These puppets are PERFECT, they're really soft and of excellent quality. I can see her and hubby playing with the baby for hours with these. I couldn't have found a better gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Child sized puppets
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute hand puppets. They're not made for adult hands. My small woman hands fit, but my husband's large hands do not.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson because he loves Winnie the Pooh. He is 11 months and he carries these around like they are his little friends. They fit my hand just fine when I actually use them as puppets with him. He squealed when he saw Tigger. (Go Grandma!) They are very sturdy and very cute. Glad I bought them for him. I taught preschool for many years and know the importance of puppet play. Had to find a cute first set for my sweetie. Just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Legler

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandchildren to perform puppet shows and they are perfect for their little hands. The puppets are soft and sewn really well. My grand kids played with these for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Winnie the Pooh Puppets
customer_reviews.text: I used this for children’s story time on Zoom. Then mailed them to kids in the audience. I’d like another set. They are not meant for large adult hands better for children, and they loved them
customer_reviews.author: Secret Rose

customer_reviews.title: They are nice
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old and I play with these when we reading Winnie the Pooh books. They are pretty, colorful. I only gave 4 stars bc they don’t fit my small hands well.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: At 3-4 months old, my child was starting to become interested in stuffed animals. To better interact and play with her, we purchased these hand puppets. She instantly loved how colorful and cute they are. My only complaint is that I do not feel safe to leave her with these on her own as toys. With that said, these hand puppets were not intended to be toys, so I can't dock them points for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Batara

customer_reviews.title: These are vey cute! They were a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: These are vey cute! They were a little more thing than what I thought they'd be, but they will definitely get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: No Winnie puppet, two tiggers
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed to open this and see that there is no Winnie puppet, rather for two tigger puppets. Obviously a mistake but still annoying
customer_reviews.author: Jen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: A very cute purchase for a 3 year old girl who just got gifted with a series of Winnie the Pooh adventure books ...
customer_reviews.author: jik

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves Pooh and friends
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves these puppets. He is 20 months and carries them around and talks to them. Takes them for a ride in his wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little small for an adult woman's hand.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and my daughter loves the floppy ear puppets the best. I don't have large hands but these are a little small for my hands. I can use them but I'd prefer if they were a smidge bigger. Someday they'll fit her hands. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T.

customer_reviews.title: So cute and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: Melissa & Doug Winnie The Pooh Soft & Cuddly Hand Puppets Plush are exactly as described... soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. These puppets are sturdy, wash well in the machine and have provided hours of entertainment for a little one that loves these characters.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Perfect size for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Perfect size for kids, but can be a little snug for someone with wider wrists. Good quality, actually looks like the characters and not some knock off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Fun and affordable Winnie the Pooh puppets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been obsessively listening to Winnie the Pooh audio books, and these were the perfect gift for Valentine's Day.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Fun to go with the book.
customer_reviews.text: These are simple, lightweight puppets which are cute. I thought they made a great gift to go along with original (or other) Winnie the Pooh books.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I already had seen these in person at Wal-Mart before I bought them online. They are great quality and SUPER CUTE. It's difficult to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Baptista

customer_reviews.title: The Cutest Pooh Puppets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's niece. Was not sure what to expect. They turned out to be great- very realistic, nice fabrics and plus materials. perfect for a child's hand or an adults hand. My son's niece loved them and everyone has been having so much fun playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cute puppets!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love these puppets, they bring a story book to life in a whole new way!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for facetiming with my granddaughter. It keeps it a little exciting! Very cute puppets!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Radow

customer_reviews.title: Creative, fun play
customer_reviews.text: Totally adorable and well-made for under $20. My kids like be playing with them.

customer_reviews.title: Softness, made well

customer_reviews.title: Could have been made better.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them

We ended up giving them to the kids so we will be buying more. Thankfully we can do so because of the great price. Highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: These are not as they are advertised

customer_reviews.title: Adorable puppets

customer_reviews.title: Best Friends

customer_reviews.title: Can't get your hand in there
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but worthless as hand puppets. You can barely (and I mean barely) fit your fingers in the arms slots, and there's not slot for the head.

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies as well!!

It adds a whole new experience when holding him. The heads of the puppets are soft so he can grab them easily. Will recommend highly and contemplating the others in the set.

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Winnie The Pooh Hand Puppets
product_meta.description:
Four adorable hand puppets make up this family-friendly collection—an excellent play set to help kids and caregivers role-play together! Four simple glove puppets with a Winnie the Pooh theme make it easy and so much fun to act out scenes, practice new vocabulary, and spend quality time playing together. It’s great for building motor skills and self-confidence, too! Made with brightly patterned, washable fabrics and built to last, these soft and sweet hand puppets are sure to be go-to toys for years to come.

This Melissa & Doug puppet set offers multiple ways to enrich the pretend-play experience. Parents can ask kids to identify each character. Kids can describe the colors, patterns, and other details of character. Parents can place one puppet on their hand and another on their child’s hand, using their puppet to ask the child’s puppet questions. The Melissa & Doug Winnie The Pooh Hand Puppets make an exceptional gift for kids ages 2 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Deluxe Puppet Theater to round out the pretend play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun.

For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we’ll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: ENTERTAINING PUPPET SET: The Melissa & Doug Winnie The Pooh Hand Puppets set contains 4 soft hand puppets, including Pooh, Piglet, Tigger, and Eeyore.
SOFT-STUFFED PLUSH MATERIAL: Our fuzzy hand-puppet set is made from soft-stuffed plush material that not only encourages cuddle time but is washable for easy cleanup.
SIZED FOR CHILDREN AND ADULTS: This hand-puppets set has been sized to fit children and most adults. Kids learn motor skills, hand-eye coordination, communication skills, self-confidence, and more.

GIFT FOR KIDS 2 TO 6: These puppets make an exceptional gift for kids ages 2 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Deluxe Puppet Theater to round out the pretend play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
